data.name: Tower Tag
data.description:
Dive into the world of TOWER TAG, where hyper-dynamic action meets thrilling PVP battles. It's a futuristic showdown like no other, where you'll wield a grappling hook locomotion method that feels completely natural and motion-sickness-free. Conquer as many tower platforms with your team as possible to be able to move quickly across the field and beat your opponents with tactics and surprise.

Seamless Movement: Say goodbye to motion sickness. TOWER TAG's intuitive grappling hook makes rapid movement second nature.

Strategic Triumph: Team up, capture towers, and conquer the battlefield with tactical precision. Speed is your ally, and the element of surprise your weapon.

Effortless Control: We've kept the controls simple, letting you immerse yourself fully. In TOWER TAG, your body becomes the controller, and the game flows naturally.

Content:
● Multiplayer between different mobile VR platforms
● 1v1, 2v2, 3v3 and 4v4 matches
● Lots of different maps and environments.
● Motion sickness free grappling hook movement and intuitive Paintball mechanics.
● Safe Space - allows uninhibited movement in small spaces
● Three different team game modes (Deathmatch, Elimination, Goal Tower)
● Intelligent bots for practicing and filling up matches
● Climb the rankings with platform specific leaderboards.
● Support of bHaptics vests and other equipment.

AND THERE IS MUCH MORE TO COME!

Get TOWER TAG today and experience the action packed adventure yourself!
